headers.Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data: blob:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; connect-src 'self' https://*.supabase.co wss://*.supabase.co https://api.yalidine.app; frame-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self'; frame-ancestors *;
